thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 2 of 68
thread.title: Sally
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text:
After flights were booked I found the same flights for the same price offered by Guru, but they added on an additional $400 fee. This service did not save me a thing and now my tickets are non-refundable. If I had booked it myself, First class is always refundable.
I have been offered a $100 refund to compensate for money lost plus a $100 future credit for travel. I feel this is a fair resolution.
